```{r}
setwd("~/Dropbox/enseignement/ml/Lectures/")
advertising <- read.csv2(file="Advertising.csv", header = T, sep=",")[,2:5]

```


```{r}
sales <- as.numeric(advertising[,4])
TV <- as.numeric(advertising[,1])
lm.fit <- lm(sales~TV)
summary(lm.fit)
```

```{r}
plot(TV, sales)
abline(lm.fit,lwd=3,col="red")
```
```{r}
coef(lm.fit)
confint(lm.fit)
```
